item.title: MIUI V14.0.12.0.TLKCNXM Fastboot update for Redmi K50 Pro China

Changelog:
[System]
Fix: Multi-finger gestures didn't always work
Updated kernel version to improve system security
Updated Android Security Patch to June 2023. Increased system security.
[Phone]
Fix: Couldn't answer calls in some cases
